Sentencas: In the development of structural and functional ceramics for high temperature electrochemical conversion devices such as solid oxide fuel cells, their mechanical properties must be tested at operational conditions, i.e. at high temperature and controlled atmospheres.
Titulo: High throughput measurement of high temperature strength of ceramics in controlled atmosphere and its use on solid oxide fuel cell anode supports

Sentencas: Furthermore, characterization of the strength of ceramic components requires testing of a high number of samples due to stochastic failures.
Titulo: High throughput measurement of high temperature strength of ceramics in controlled atmosphere and its use on solid oxide fuel cell anode supports

Sentencas: Successive heating and testing a single sample is very time consuming and consequently this hinders thorough studies with sufficient samples at operational conditions.
Titulo: High throughput measurement of high temperature strength of ceramics in controlled atmosphere and its use on solid oxide fuel cell anode supports

Sentencas: This work presents a methodology for testing multiple samples at operational conditions providing a high throughput and thus the possibility achieve high reliability.
Titulo: High throughput measurement of high temperature strength of ceramics in controlled atmosphere and its use on solid oxide fuel cell anode supports

Sentencas: Optical methods are used to measure deformations contactless, frictionless load measuring is achieved, and multiple samples are handled in one heat up.
Titulo: High throughput measurement of high temperature strength of ceramics in controlled atmosphere and its use on solid oxide fuel cell anode supports

Sentencas: The methodology is validated at room temperature, and exemplified by measurement of the strength of solid oxide fuel cell anode supports at 800 degrees C. (C) 2014
Titulo: High throughput measurement of high temperature strength of ceramics in controlled atmosphere and its use on solid oxide fuel cell anode supports
